hero_section.title: Themes & add-ons for job boards
hero_section.desc: Astoundify provides everything you need to power your online business.

section1.title: Handcrafted designs with usability and profit in mind.
section1.description: With a focus on usability, conversions, empathy for your customers and tight integration with plugins like WooCommerce and Easy Digital Downloads, you won’t find better themes for your site.

section2.title: Add extra functionality to our themes with tailor-made plugins.
section2.description: Our team has spent thousands of hours coding a variety of features you might want to add to your site, all so you can get started quickly and easily.

testimonial.description: If you’re trying to get a marketplace, directory or job board site launched in a matter of hours, there’s only one name you need to know: Astoundify.
testimonial.name: JAWB.IO

section5.title: Learn, share and grow with our community.
